input.sentences: we arrived at the wedding right on time .
we walked up and they were just coming down the aisle .
they said there vows and it was official .
they left on their honeymoon and everyone went home .
output.sentences: As the wedding time arrived, the groomsmen decorated the couple's car.
The bride walked, unaware of the coming surprise, slowly down the aisle.
Their vows were recited and after the official announcement he took her hand.
The attendees clapped and celebrated as he held up his new wife's hand.
When they left the party they were surprised that the car was decorated for their honeymoon because they ended up just going home.
